QuestData.Title: The Tidestone: Shattered
QuestData.Description: I suppose you can go in, then.$b$bThe shattered pieces of the Tidestone of Golganneth are contained within the academy's eastern wing. Even as curator, I cannot attest to their condition, as I have not been in to inspect them in many millennia.$b$bOh, young $n? Please do not touch anything.
QuestData.CompletionText: <The last remaining piece of the Tidestone lies before you.>
QuestData.RewardText: <You notice the reflection of something sinister upon the core's surface...>
